title: Flow Cytometry Preparation
author: Opentrons
description: This protocols allows the robot to perform flow cytometry preparation by transferring media, chemical, and cells into wells B2-G11 of up to 4 different plates.
process:
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your tiprack, pipette, and labware using the OT app. For calibration tips, check out our support articles.
Hit "run" and watch your robot do the rest!
Fills the wells B2-G11 of the target 96-well plates (P2, P4, P5, and P6) with 182 uL of media from a 50 mL tube using a P300_Single pipette.
Aspirates 30 uL of chemical from P1 wells A1-F1 and dispenses into B2-G2, B5-G5, B6-G6 of P2 using a P50_multi pipette.
Aspirates 30 uL of chemical from P1 wells A2-F2 and dispenses into B3-G3, B6-G6, B9-G9 of P2.
Aspirates 30 uL of chemical from P1 wells A3-F3 and dispenses into B4-G4, B7-G7, B10-G10 of P2.
Repeat the pattern of steps 2-4 three more times to finish filling P4, P5, and P6 with chemicals on the rest of the P1 columns (A4-A12).
Transfers 8 uL of cells from P3 wells B2-G2 to wells B2-G11 of all the target wells plates. Tips are changed every time the pipette goes back P3.
notes: Tips need to be manually removed from wells G1-H12 of tiprack in slot 7 to prevent pipette from hindering the liquid transfer.

markdown.title: Flow Cytometry Preparation
markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.description: This protocols allows the robot to perform flow cytometry preparation by transferring media, chemical, and cells into wells B2-G11 of up to 4 different plates.
markdown.reagents:
* Yeast media
* Chemicals in DMSO
* Yeast cells
markdown.process:
1. Download your protocol.
2. Upload your protocol into [OT App](https://opentrson.com/ot-app).
3. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
4. Calibrate your tiprack, pipette, and labware using the OT app. For calibration tips, check out our [support articles](https://support.opentrons.com/getting-started/software-setup/calibrating-the-pipettes).
5. Hit "run" and watch your robot do the rest!
6. Fills the wells B2-G11 of the target 96-well plates (P2, P4, P5, and P6) with 182 uL of media from a 50 mL tube using a P300_Single pipette.
7. Aspirates 30 uL of chemical from P1 wells A1-F1 and dispenses into B2-G2, B5-G5, B6-G6 of P2 using a P50_multi pipette.
8. Aspirates 30 uL of chemical from P1 wells A2-F2 and dispenses into B3-G3, B6-G6, B9-G9 of P2.
9. Aspirates 30 uL of chemical from P1 wells A3-F3 and dispenses into B4-G4, B7-G7, B10-G10 of P2.
10. Repeat the pattern of steps 2-4 three more times to finish filling P4, P5, and P6 with chemicals on the rest of the P1 columns (A4-A12).
11. Transfers 8 uL of cells from P3 wells B2-G2 to wells B2-G11 of all the target wells plates. Tips are changed every time the pipette goes back P3.
markdown.notes: Tips need to be manually removed from wells G1-H12 of tiprack in slot 7 to prevent pipette from hindering the liquid transfer.
